item.title: Ark Invest's Cathie Wood says the most underappreciated application of AI is health care
item.description: "I think the most underappreciated application of AI is health care. Health care is responsible for an incredible amount of storage," Wood said.

item.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway scoops up more Sirius XM, boosting stake to 35%
item.description: The Omaha, Nebraska-based conglomerate purchased roughly 2.3 million shares for about $54 million in separate transactions Thursday through Monday.
